title: [極URGENT]全世界去BBC填個 complain. 叫佢補番facts.快！

replies.msg:
[極URGENT]唔知做咩BBC完全donwplay左的士佬恐襲撞人(話係striking, in fact係car ramming attack, causing several casualties先啱）
。。全世界去BBC填個 complain. 叫佢補番facts.快！！！！！
https://ssl.bbc.co.uk/complaints/forms/?lang=en&reset=&uid=706898575


complain內容填以下comment：
In the lower half section of the page, https://www.google.com/amp/s/www.bbc.co.uk/news/amp/world-asia-china-49949548

"A driver in his 60s was dragged out of..." You have left out the fact that he launched a car-ramming attack into crowds, causing several injured, one legs broken & in critical condition! Thats why protestors drag him out to prevent him from escaping / ramming into others again! Please amend the news and add back the fact!

the ramming footage:
original owner:
https://twitter.com/dalj_k/status/1180786423491776512?s=19

backup:

Your complaint has been submitted

覆咗"An earlier version of this article reported that “a driver in his 60s was dragged out of his vehicle in Sham Shui Po and beaten by protesters after reportedly striking a demonstrator”.

As more information became available, in what was a developing news story, this line was updated and now refers to how a taxi driver “was badly beaten in Sham Shui Po after reportedly driving his car into a crowd, injuring at least one person”."
